title: SAP Demo Data Personalization Add-On Enhances Customer-Focused Demonstrations
summary: SAP has released a new add-on for data personalization in customer-focused demonstrations, promising personalized, real-time demos to improve relevance for sales teams and customers. This could enhance the employee service experience by providing more tailored and efficient sales processes.
hook: SAP's new add-on promises personalized, real-time demos.

title: MuleSoft gains Agent Scanners to rein in enterprise AI chaos
summary: Salesforce has introduced Agent Scanners to its integration platform, MuleSoft, to address the issue of agent sprawl across enterprises. This new feature aims to enhance operational efficiency and governance, making it easier for enterprises to scale AI responsibly and safely.
hook: Salesforce's MuleSoft tackles agent sprawl with new Agent Scanners.

title: ServiceNow will embed OpenAI models into its AI Platform
summary: ServiceNow plans to integrate OpenAI models into its AI platform to enhance enterprise AI outcomes and develop direct speech-to-speech technology. This move is significant for ITSM/ITOM/HRSM/ESM/EX buyers as it represents a major step towards AI-powered automation and improved natural interactions, potentially transforming service management and employee experience.
hook: ServiceNow to revolutionize ES with OpenAI integration!

title: GoodData launches MCP server to fuel AI-powered analysis
summary: GoodData has launched a Model Context Protocol server, a tool that allows AI applications to access proprietary data for continuous analysis and development of analytics tools. This could simplify the process of building new AI applications for ES buyers, potentially enhancing ITSM, ITOM, HRSM, ESM, and workflow automation.
hook: GoodData's new server could simplify AI application development.

title: Latest News
summary: Enghouse Interactive, a global provider of customer contact software, offers a comprehensive portfolio of modular solutions that cover the full range of contact centre capabilities, including AI-enabled agent evaluation. Their platform agnostic solutions can integrate with various UC vendors, providing flexible deployment options to meet specific requirements.
hook: Enghouse Interactive enhances contact centre capabilities with AI

title: News
summary: A new tool is being introduced that provides real-time budget awareness for agent reasoning loops, aiming to control escalating costs in enterprise technology. This is particularly relevant for mission-critical applications like ERP, CRM, and data platforms, which have seen the largest cost increases due to vendor consolidation, consumption-based pricing, and market leverage.
hook: New tool tackles rising enterprise tech costs!

title: News
summary: CRM software provider Salesforce is enhancing its AI capabilities through recent acquisitions and introducing flexible payment options for its Agentforce AI suite. This move could lower the entry barrier for businesses seeking advanced AI solutions for their ITSM and ESM needs.
hook: Salesforce boosts AI capabilities, offers flexible payment for Agentforce.

title: Aaron Tan
summary: Aaron Tan, a seasoned journalist with extensive experience in technology and information management, has joined Informa TechTarget's Omdia research team as regional director for Asia-Pacific. His insights could influence trends in ITSM, ITOM, ESM, HR service management, employee experience, and workflow automation in the region.
